members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT wmNotifyChild (NMHDR hdr, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT wmNotifyChild (NMHDR hdr, int wParam, int lParam)

members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT wmNotifyChild (NMHDR hdr, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT wmNotifyChild (NMHDR hdr, int wParam, int lParam)

members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT wmSysKeyDown (int hwnd, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT wmSysKeyDown (int hwnd, int wParam, int lParam)
diff: +			* Feature in Windows.  Calling to ToAscii() or ToUnicode(), clears
+			* the accented state such that the next WM_CHAR loses the accent.
+			* This makes is critical that the accent key is detected.  Also,
+			* these functions clear the character that is entered using the
+			* special Windows keypad sequence when NumLock is down (ie. typing
+			* ALT+0231 should gives 'c' with a cedilla when NumLock is down).
